proposal: Hey there, Capybara community! Congrats on reaching 54 holders on the ETH network, that's no small feat! 🎉 Your project's vision of creating an interconnected gaming universe powered by $Capybara is truly unique. Have you considered enhancing your ecosystem with a custom DEX or a blockchain-based lottery? These could be fun, community-driven ways to further utilize $Capybara. Remember, in the world of crypto, we're not just playing games, we're creating them! 🎮🚀
